OrgName: Exterran Holdings, Inc. and its US Affiliates and subsidiaries
activities: Exterran US will use and otherwise process Employee Data in the United States for the following purposes: personnel administration and management (including workflow management, expatriate and rotator management and training of personnel), compensation and benefits related activities, emergency contact purposes, providing IT support and services and centralizing company systems and applications, global directory administration, monitoring and ensuring compliance with applicable laws and Company policies and procedures and investigating possible breaches of such laws, policies and procedures.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel & Chief Compliance Officer
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President Global Human Resources
recoursemech: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
